articles.title: Dept. of Homeland Security looks for new immigrant family detention sites along U.S.-Mexico border
articles.description: The Department of Homeland Security is trying to identify new facilities along the U.S.-Mexico border to house immigrant families, at least 15K beds.

articles.author: Corpus Christi Caller Times, John C Moritz and Natalia E Contreras, Corpus Christi Caller Times
articles.title: Reunification process for immigrant children uncertain as court cases continue
articles.description: A day after President Trump's executive order on immigrant children separated from their parents much still remains in limbo. Here's what we know.
